rules.name: HTML Files - No Cache
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.html$"

rules.name: CSS Files - Cache 1 Year
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.css$"

rules.name: JS Files - Cache 1 Year
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.js$"

rules.name: Images - Cache 1 Year
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and (http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.webp$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.jpg$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.jpeg$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.png$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.svg$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.gif$")

rules.name: Fonts - Cache 1 Year
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and (http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.woff$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.woff2$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.ttf$" or http.request.uri.path matches "^.*\.eot$")

rules.name: Assets Folder - Cache 1 Year
rules.expression: (http.host eq "www.adanithane-launch.com" or http.host eq "adanithane-launch.com") and http.request.uri.path matches "^/assests/.*"
